column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Police raided Chinese-owned businesses on Tuesday
column8: Preah Sihanouk City.------38 suspects were detained
column9: including 23 Chinese (11 men) and 15 Thai women.------The raids on three Chinese-owned sex trafficking sites
column10: found evidence of human trafficking crimes
column11: including used condoms.------According to the police
column12: they are investigating and sending the suspects to  the provincial court
column13: although the mastermind behind the operation is believed to still be at large. ------SOURCE
